    PCCW Solutions Malaysia Sdn Bhd Vacancies Senior Training Specialist

    November 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    PCCW Solutions Malaysia Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Senior Training Specialist position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Leads the training and knowledge programs
    • Conduct quality needs analysis with the Subject Matter Expert (SME) to design courseware for effective learning by gathering the learning needs, content, schedule and scalability requirements for development projects
    • Design and develop e-learning storyboard and courses based on sound pedagogy, accessibility, and usability principles
    • Coordinate with internal team to prepare developed modules for quality testing and deployment in LMS
    • Supports change and transition initiatives (Training Needs Analysis, Change Impact Assessment, Transition Phasing and Adoption Monitoring)
    • Effective use of digital media, eLearning development tools, and other emerging technologies to create and deliver quality computer based training
    • Prepares instructional or training documentation for communication to end users
    Requirements
    • Applied knowledge in instructional Design and Technology, or a related field in Education and Training
    • At least 2-3 years working experience in Curriculum Design, Instructional Design, Content Development and Training practices including blended learning targeted to working professionals
    • Familiar with content authoring software and applications commonly used to develop e- learning and multimedia content such as Articulate
    • Ability to use coding to supplement features in eLearning authoring tools (i.e generating certificates)
    • Skilled in video and audio editing for eLearning purposes.
    • Able to create professional-looking and engaging slides for interactive learning.
    • Have a good working knowledge of eLearning standards including SCORM, xAPI technologies and learning management systems
    • Expertise in developing training plans, creating training content, and executing in-person and online training with stakeholder teams
    • Proactive attitude to resolve problems and deliver results
    • Experience developing eLearning courseware, job aids, online tutorials and/or other training materials
    • Track record of operating independently, setting schedules, identifying priorities, and successfully delivering projects
    • Oversee innovative training solutions supporting organizational objectives
    • Excellent coordination, project management, and organization skills
    • Communicate effectively with team members and customers, both written and verbal
    • Please share sample of your work

    Company Overview

    PCCW Solutions, the IT flagship of PCCW Group, is a leading IT services company, a digital transformation and outsourcing partner of choice for clients in all industries across the Pan-Asia region. We adopt cutting-edge technologies to empower clients transform digitally, create business values and success in the ever-changing economic environment.
    With our global data center coverage and innovative Infinitum™ solutions suite, including Cloud, Advanced Analytics, AI, Digital and IoT solutions, we have digitally transformed businesses across many industries, revolutionizing the way they operate, and transforming customer experiences along the way.
    PCCW Solutions has been at the forefront of driving innovation and delivering industry-specific solutions for enterprises clients to accelerate their digital transformation, and playing a key role in supplying and maintaining some of the most critical IT systems in the public sector.
    We have Pan-Asia regional presence in Singapore, the Philippines, Hong Kong, Macau, Taiwan and mainland China with 11 office locations across the region. Our Singapore office serves as the regional hub for Southeast Asia, supported by a regional delivery center in the Philippines. With our extensive, widely-recognized business credentials and experience in managing large-scale projects, PCCW Solutions has become a trusted partner to a diversity of organizations from different sectors.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
